Model.Tanks

Class Tank

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • Model.Tanks.Tank
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TankPlayer, TankSecondPlayer

    public class Tank
extends java.lang.Thread
    Class that is responsible for the actions of the neutral/enemy tanks.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Main method that starts thread. It also synchronizes actions frequency.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:

        public void moveTank()
        Method that controls movement of the tank with selected pattern.

      • moveProjectiles

        public void moveProjectiles()
        Method that is responsible for spawning projectiles and creating cooldown. If the tank is destroyed it also hides all of the maintaining projectiles.

      • getLifePoints

        public int getLifePoints()

      • tankDestruction

        public void tankDestruction()
        Method responsible for the tank destruction. It creates explosion animations and sounds. After destruction the tank is removed from the tank list.
